title: The Importance of Being Seven
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: And we'll go shopping in Forsyth's, and Jenners too, and motor out to Gleneagles.

title: Sunshine on Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: There are lots of people who would actually prefer to go to the pub than to go to Gleneagles.

title: Sunshine on Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "What about all those other people who can't afford to go to Gleneagles?

title: Sunshine on Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "The minister is about to make a speech to some gathering of influential businessmen at Gleneagles and . . ."

title: A second series of Curious storied traditions of Scottish life
author: Leighton, Alexander
snippet: I haveseen him, when in company with Kincaldrum,- andDudhope, and Gleneagles, and the rest, laughingtill his face was as red as the sun, then, all of asudden, when some of his moods came over him,turn just like a fiend new come out of-—oh, I'lljust say it out, Aminadab, though you be of theSeceders—just hell, lad."
